column3: Successfully tested all MET sensor inputs, RF modem, IM data, and GPS (with rooftop antenna), waiting for SIM card.
Ran Bench current drain test for 3 days with version 2.01, 170530 firmware, RF modem turned off, 13.23mA Average. Downloaded and checked Flash RAM data, which looked good.
Tested internal GPS & Iridium antenna by doing an GPS & XMIT outside, which successfully registered and sent dummy files, plus GPS got position, and Time & Date update.

Tried to use for PI2-19, put outside for testing, started LOG mode, but this system got no iridium calls through overnight.  When I tried numerous XMIT commands, the system registered, but always got the message "NO CONNECT MESSAGE RECEIVED".  NEEDS TESTING, TROUBLESHOOTING.

Bench tested with rooftop Iridium antenna.  Sent the XMIT command, and the system registered and it SUCCESSFULLY got online, and send all 6 dummy blocks without a problem, plus files acknowledged and system hung up, ended call without a problem.  Did this XMIT several times. Maybe bad internal Iridium antenna cable, or bad antenna.

REPLACED Iridium Antenna cable.  Successfully tested XMITs outside and GPS outside, did 3 XMITs to of 3 successful.  It could not register the one time, but did NOT see error messgae of "no connect message received".
